virtual bool log4cpp::OstreamAppender::reopen ( ) [virtual]
 

Reopens the output destination of this Appender, e.g.

the logfile or TCP socket.

Returns:
false if an error occured during reopening, true otherwise.

Reimplemented from log4cpp::Appender.

virtual bool log4cpp::OstreamAppender::requiresLayout ( ) const [virtual]
 

Check if the appender uses a layout.

If the appender implementation admits a layout but can also work without it, then it should return true.

Reimplemented from log4cpp::Appender.
